name: watch this guy for 5 hours simulator
name_original: watch this guy for 5 hours simulator
description: hey, i have someone you gotta watch over. you can keep him in a seperate tab or screen, just don't minimize him. he doesn't like that. he also has some people that come over. ignore them. only they know that this is a simulation. dont tell the guy that he's in an app. thanks. version 1.1
